channel.title: Need Help Making Run.bat Hidden From Task Bar When running!
channel.description:
ok so i need help on making it so that when i click run.bat and have server running it will run the batch file but be hidden from task bari know many tuts have this but not seem to be working ill post my code for what my run.bat says and would be greatly appreciated if someone could edit it and repost so that it will hide the .bat file when running
thanks in advance!
MY CODE FOR MY RUN.BAT!:
@echo off title server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server exit

item.title: Need Help Making Run.bat Hidden From Task Bar When running!
item.dc:creator: @death_t_d death t d
item.description:
@death_t_d wrote:

go on google and search “tray it” download it then run it. Then close the little box that shows up. Then run your run.bat and on the minimize button hold shift the click it. Is should then be in the bottom right corner where the time is. Hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Making Run.bat Hidden From Task Bar When running!

item.title: Need Help Making Run.bat Hidden From Task Bar When running!
item.dc:creator: @sheercoldpvp sheercoldpvp
item.description:
@sheercoldpvp wrote:

ok so i need help on making it so that when i click run.bat and have server running it will run the batch file but be hidden from task bari know many tuts have this but not seem to be working ill post my code for what my run.bat says and would be greatly appreciated if someone could edit it and repost so that it will hide the .bat file when running

thanks in advance!

MY CODE FOR MY RUN.BAT!:

@echo off
title server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
exit
